name: Portfolio Website (Personal)
description: A modern, responsive portfolio website serving as a professional presentation of skills, experience, and projects. Developed with a focus on performance and clean, modular design.
features: Showcases professional profile and technical expertise.
Responsive design optimized for multiple screen sizes.
Clear organization of education, experience, and projects.
Uses modern web development practices (Next.js for performance).

name: Localy (University Project)
description: A web platform designed to help users find and explore local establishments, primarily small and micro-businesses. Developed as a university project to apply modern full-stack technologies and explore new backend services like Supabase.
features: Categorized list of businesses for easy discovery.
Detailed business section showing schedules, descriptions, and addresses.
Displays amenities offered by each local.
User-generated reviews and star rating system.
Utilizes Supabase for database management and backend services.
